attributes.action: Ban the use of the Caps lock key
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On all computers made after the date 28th May 2007. This will hopefully retify people having to spend so much time re writing emails after typing them in CAPITAL LETTERS.  I am sure the civil service admin time would be halved

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
